body:
Comment 11: 
There's the beginning of an interesting idea here, one that has been talked about many
times in the past, but to 
address it right requires coupling it to proper support for exceptions.  The channel
needs to be known to the 
runtime so it can signal even if the goroutine exits prematurely,  perhaps from a fault.
 That is not mere syntactic 
sugar.

Marking it WontFix until such time as a full design for exceptions is underway.
_Status changed to **WontFix**._
